name: Breaker Fun 2 - Zombie Games
description:
Ready to defend and rebuild your home from the Zombie attack?
Join the brand-new hit adventure where you'll meet and defeat hilarious zombies to defend your own land!

The newest game in the Breaker Fun series. Now you've entered the exciting zombie map.

GAME FEATURES:
● Crush and break all the bricks in the puzzle shooting game.
● Claim decoration items to rebuild your home from the Zombie attack.
● Special boosters to help you pass difficult levels.
● A free and easy way to play classic breaker puzzles, challenging to master!

If you like puzzle adventures, you’ll enjoy this hilarious zombie game!

Home Defense is an easy-to-play but challenging game, take advantage of each part of our idle game, you will be the super home defender.
